search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for ClickSend SMS (clicksend.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for ClickSend SMS is: [https://www.clicksend.com/pricing/](https://www.clicksend.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Pay-as-you-go pricing
=====================

Why choose ClickSend?
---------------------

![Image 65: Lightning bolt icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-lightning-flash.svg)

Lightning fast delivery times
-----------------------------

No delay drama. Your texts are sent via direct routes for on-time arrival.

![Image 66: World globe icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-global-reach.svg)

Global reach
------------

Send to 190+ countries. It’s easy to set-up numbers and register globally.

![Image 67: Headset icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-customer-support.svg)

Amazing 24/7 support
--------------------

Our experts are online and ready to help, every single day of the year.

![Image 68: Arrow passing through a circle icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-reliable-uptime.svg)

Reliable 99.95% uptime
----------------------

When you want to reach your customers, our platform is available.

![Image 69: Shield with tick icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-security.svg)

Strong data security
--------------------

Keep your company and your customers’ data safe and secure.

![Image 70: Arrow and target icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-check-circle.svg)

Unstoppable direct routes
-------------------------

We only use trusted direct routes so your messages arrive ASAP.

![Image 71: 1 cent coin icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-sms-card.svg)

SMS from
--------

Competitive pricing to keep your costs low and your ROI high.

![Image 72: Dial turned to max icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-high-volume.svg)

High volume = cheaper rates
---------------------------

Send more to spend less. Chat to us about high volume pricing options.

![Image 73: Two parallel arrows icon](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-free-subscription.svg)

Free inbound messages
---------------------

You'll never be charged for replies so you can keep the chat flowing.

![Image 74: Loading circle graphic](https://www.clicksend.com/img/loading.svg)

[![Image 75: ClickSend Footer Logo](https://www.clicksend.com/img/img-shared-logo_footer.svg)](https://www.clicksend.com/us/)![Image 76: ic-feather-location-arrow](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-feather-location-arrow.svg)  [English (United States)](https://www.clicksend.com/us/region-select/)

![Image 77: ic-feather-office-building](https://www.clicksend.com/img/ic-feather-office-building.svg)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on usage and varies by service type (SMS, MMS, Voice, etc.). High volume discounts are available.

=====================

Business SMS that’s great value

### SMS from:

$0.0084_/ text_

Access the full pricing breakdown here

[Start for free](https://dashboard.clicksend.com/signup)No credit card needed

*   Free inbound SMS, always.
    
*   Easy set-up. Send your first SMS in minutes.
    
*   Pay-as-you-go, no contracts.
    
*   24/7 global support from an expert team.
    
*   Bulk SMS discounts available. [Let's chat](https://www.clicksend.com/en/help/).
    

![Image 48: Loading circle graphic](https://www.clicksend.com/img/loading.svg)

MMS
---

### Outbound

#### $0.0333 / MMS

### Inbound

#### Always Free

### Dedicated Number

#### $3.14 / month

##### No Setup Fees

Pricing is in US Dollars.

Additional carrier fees apply. Learn more [here](https://help.clicksend.com/article/2sqgt7ykbw-sms-and-mms-carrier-fees)

[Get Started for Free](https://dashboard.clicksend.com/signup)

![Image 49: Loading circle graphic](https://www.clicksend.com/img/loading.svg)

#### Calling Mobile: $0.0129 / Call

#### Calling Landline: $0.0129 / Call

Pricing is in US Dollars.

[Get Started for Free](https://dashboard.clicksend.com/signup)

![Image 50: Loading circle graphic](https://www.clicksend.com/img/loading.svg)

Email
-----

### Outbound

| Estimated Messages | Price/Email |
| --- | --- |
| Under 25k | $0.0063 |
| 25k or more | $0.0050 |
| 200k or more | $0.0038 |
| 5Mil or more | $0.0025 |
| over 10Mil | [Contact Us](https://www.clicksend.com/en/help/sales/) |

### Inbound

#### Always free

Unlimited contacts. No monthly fees. Only pay for what you use.

Pricing is in US Dollars.

[Get Started for Free](https://dashboard.clicksend.com/signup)

![Image 51: Loading circle graphic](https://www.clicksend.com/img/loading.svg)

---

### Outbound

#### $0.0302 / Page

### Inbound

#### Always Free

#### $3.7700 / month

##### No Setup Fees

Faxes sent to toll-free/shared cost numbers are charged at twice the normal rate.

Pricing is in US Dollars.

[Get Started for Free](https://dashboard.clicksend.com/signup)

![Image 52: Loading circle graphic](https://www.clicksend.com/img/loading.svg)

Regular

### $0.85 Each
